name: Heroic Inspiration
duration: Until used or until you gain another instance of Heroic Inspiration
description: Heroic Inspiration is a special resource in D&D 2024 that allows a character to reroll any d20 Test (attack roll, ability check, or saving throw). You must use the new roll. A character can have only one instance of Heroic Inspiration at a time.

effects.value: Reroll the d20, must use new result

howToGain: Rolling a 1 on a d20 Test (natural 1) grants Heroic Inspiration in 2024 rules
DM award for excellent roleplaying, clever problem-solving, or heroic actions
Certain class features and backgrounds may grant it
Human species trait grants Heroic Inspiration when you finish a Long Rest
rules: You can have only one instance of Heroic Inspiration at a time
If you gain Heroic Inspiration when you already have it, you can give it to another player character
You decide to use it after rolling the d20 but before the DM announces the outcome
You must use the new roll
notes: Heroic Inspiration replaces the Inspiration mechanic from the 2014 rules. The key difference is you reroll (must use new result) rather than gaining Advantage.
